name: Alien Crusader
description: Alien Crusader is an action packed, vertical scrolling, space shooter game, similar to classic coin-up arcade and shoot'em up games.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: 2 GHz processor (supporting SSE2 instruction set or higher) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Shader version 2.0 capable video card DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 256 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: 3 GHz processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800/AMD Radeon HD 5670 or equivalent video card (Dedicated GPU with 512MB or higher Video Memory(VRAM)) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
